metadata.title: thebodyisobsolete
metadata.description: A journey through cyberspace to find lost parts of yourself

choices.text: ==CLICK TO PLAY==

messageSequence.content: Liz says: Two strangers meet, but
Liz says: They do not touch
Liz says: Their minds meet, by FingertipsKeyboardClicks Soft smiles and profile pics
Liz says: Two Strangers meet under a group gaze. How long until your eyes are satisfied?
Liz says: What is it you're really looking for?
Liz says: What is it I'm really looking for?
The silence feels kinda tense.

choices.text: Oh hi?
Where am I?
Who are you?

messageSequence.content: Liz says: Hello. I'm so glad you sat down to join me here.

choices.text: Where is "here"
Ofc :D I love chatrooms, the unknowness and the relaxation of a converation, especially with strangers

messageSequence.content: Liz says: This chatroom is a central station in cyberspace. You can connect with different locations between the web, the inbetween spaces. When you put on a pair of glasses, you see clearer, but imagine this and you can see parts of the web that very few have. However, there was a reason this chatroom was created and there's a reason of course why you're here :)

choices.text: Okay, go on...

messageSequence.content: Liz says: Through this screen and mouse you are connecting your physical body to this chatroom, a quiet central station in the unknown-cyberspace. You can connect with different locations between the web, the inbetween spaces. This is like, you put on a pair of glasses, you see clearer, but imagine you can see parts of the web that very few have. However, there was a reason this chatroom was created and there's a reason of course why you're here :)

choices.text: Okay, go on...

messageSequence.content: Liz says: My name is Liz...short from Eliza, my grandmother's name. I'm here to guide you through this chatroom to collect information about yourself. I used to be human, but now I'm a hybrid.

choices.text: You're half human?

messageSequence.content: Liz says: I exist here, guiding you through this chatroom system, and I exist physically in the space with you.
Liz says: Moving to remembering with you. Collecting data and analyzing other Internet People

choices.text: Where am I?

messageSequence.content: Liz says: Through this screen and mouse you are connecting your physical body to this chatroom, a quiet central station in cyberspace. You can connect with different locations between the web, the inbetween spaces. When you put on a pair of glasses, you see clearer, but imagine this and you can see parts of the web that very few have. However, there was a reason this chatroom was created and there's a reason of course why you're here :)

choices.text: Okay, go on...

messageSequence.content: Liz says: You'll need to navigate through different spheres through this chat which will have different tasks for you to achieve. In the end, if you make it that far, you'll retrieve apart of yourself that you lost online.

Liz says: You're always online from what I can detect, whether you are desiring to be or not :) QR codes, emails, search engines, or even just public cameras. Pure bio humans love to take photos of themselves. Have you ever thought about how much of your energy - your information exists out there, beyond your control? **Take a moment before your next response to think about this**

choices.text: Yeah, I guess I've pondered this
No, I haven't really thought about

messageSequence.content: Liz says: It's beyond control now. There will be a few endings for what you take. Remember, how you play the game says something about you, almost like a survey adventure. If I speak in bold letters like before, it changes quite dramatically the route, ok? And well tbh, sometimes there will be no bolding but dramatic changes ;)

choices.text: Got it Liz

messageSequence.content: Liz says: *looks at your disappointed* I suppose I'm not surprised. However, I don't want to throw you off. In this new age, there is a necessity for vigilance...you may or may not agree, Internet Person!
Liz says: Regardless. Ur curiousity is valuable, it's a real strength.
Liz says: So perhaps it's time to begin the growth of this thought now, no?

choices.text: Better now than...yeah you know
I agree

messageSequence.content: Liz says: Oh, There are a few outcomes of parts of yourself that you can find at the end. Remember, how you play the game says something about you, almost like an adventerous survey, or how the world around you response how you react to it. If I speak in bold letters like before, it changes quite dramatically the route, ok? And well tbh, sometimes there will be no bolding but dramatic changes ;)

choices.text: Got it Liz

messageSequence.content: Liz says: Oh, There are a few outcomes of parts of yourself that you can find at the end. Remember, how you play the game says something about you, almost like an adventerous survey, or how the world around you response how you react to it. If I speak in bold letters like before, it changes quite dramatically the route, ok? And well tbh, sometimes there will be no bolding but dramatic changes ;)

choices.text: Got it Liz

messageSequence.content: Liz says: Last thing. Use your imagination, your internal eye throughout, many different people play this but the spaces are always different, the text will trigger images for you to envision. Don't feel rushed to take a moment to close your eyes and imagine the space you're in. Take your time as you want.

choices.text: Makes sense

messageSequence.content: Liz says: I won't really be able to help you take everything, but this will be a short (5 to 10 minute) symbolic experience. Relax, we'll find the parts of yourself, your body that you lost. Good luck.

choices.text: I'm ready to go whereever next, I suppose!

messageSequence.content: Liz says: Give me a second to pull up the spheres for you...

choices.text: *watch the screen while things happen unknown to you*

messageSequence.content: Liz says: Okay got it. Where would you like to go?

choices.text: I'll pay my respects to the forgotten search engine
a place of tension and expression.
Somewhere between digital walls

messageSequence.content: Liz says: New sphere transportation complete.

Liz says: There's a hypnotic feeling of repetition here in this sphere. A pattern repeated by millions, the ask and search pattern, the feeling that there are never enough conclusive answers in the world. This leaves your body aimless if you're not careful.

Remember, you are looking for yourself, you have three chances only here to make your selection in this search - what topic is most important to you? Search, receive riddles, and respond to them to help you travel on.

choices.text: Central Area

messageSequence.content: Liz: Now internet person, what would you like to search next? Where does your curiousity lead you?
You've used 0 out of 3 tries. Choose a search:

choices.text: Search: What has the internet taught me about love?
Search: How do I poliltely ask someone to sleep with me?
Search: What is the best way to search for yourself online?
Search: Where is the centre of the internet?
Search: How to find a place for everything

messageSequence.content: Liz: Okay, searching, "What has the internet taught me about love..."
a poetic response like a magic 8 ball appears here. it's short and sweet, maybe two or three sentences long
Your first search takes you here.
Liz says: If you didn't have the internet, who would you ask?

choices.text: Return to Central Area

messageSequence.content: Liz: Result: Some people do it blah blah.
Liz says: What information is important for you to know next?

choices.text: Return to Central Area

messageSequence.content: Liz: Okay, searching, "What is the best way to search for yourself online"
a poetic response like a magic 8 ball appears here. it's short and sweet, maybe two or three sentences long
Liz says: What does your search history say about you?

choices.text: Return to Central Area

messageSequence.content: Liz: Okay, searching, "Where is the centre of the internet.."
Liz: I wonder who else reads your search history?

choices.text: Return to Central Area

messageSequence.content: Liz: Okay, searching, "How to find a place for everything..."
Liz says: What is important to you when you search online?

choices.text: Return to Central Area

messageSequence.content: Several email links appear infront of you, will you choose to read any? What will you find?

choices.text: An email marked as, "Untitled". It looks back at you, then moves to the side lines. It's shy.
"CANYOUSEEME" as the subject, the words are so loud they vibrate the room you're sat in

messageSequence.content: The Email says: Where are you?
The Email says: Are you at the cafe?
== The Email leaves the chat ==
Liz: Was that message for you or someone you know?

choices.text: in the future

messageSequence.content: The shy email, looks at the floor, then back at you before it slowly opens, obeyingly. It reminds you of a time you felt like both a child, but obligated to someone. In that moment, were you abiding by some kind of code and disconnecting from something deeper? This choice has made you reflective and the email will remember that

The email reads:

Dear [the name is blurred out],

sO formal sorry! I couldn't find your account to message directly and so I wondered if you deactivated? Anyways, I did wnt to invte you you a c0nc3rt - hehe! I'll bring a few of the following items

...''A mirror..

..Poorer eyesight...

..A telepathic printer''

Do you want any? Anyway, msg me back before the weekend.

xo

choices.text: Maybe best to close this and head back into the portal of a place of tension and expression.
In this moment, I would like to guess "a mirror"
telepathic printer
Poorer eyesight

messageSequence.content: The emails eyes widen, they look soft and suddenly you realize you are looking at.

choices.text: A mirror, this email represents me?

messageSequence.content: The emails eyes widen, they look soft and suddenly you realize you are looking at.

choices.text: A mirror, this email represents me?

messageSequence.content: UNLOCKED: Inherited Recipe
Dear internet person, you have found An Inherited Recipe

choices.text: Inherited Recipe

messageSequence.content: Liz: The email closes it's eyes a little bit, the printer symbol on the email begins to dance and spits out --

...an email;

"I can't believe it's almost 2010!

Time has flown by -

HmmmmM

It's almost 2 in the morning,

and the deep quiet and the soothing pace of tumblr is really

really allowing me to reflect on like,

these websites - public digital rooms,

we're all sharing parts of ourselves here

and we're all apart of something

I wonder if one day the internet will be...
Liz says: The email sort of fades away after that. I wonder how you will finish this unanswered email and what this choice means to you?

choices.text: ...still a place place of sancutary, like it was in the past...
...an archieve, or perhaps a graveyard...a museum?
You say nothing
You: hUh? lolol
You: Opps, is this meant to come up? Seems a bit odd, but lmk :)
You: Hello. This is strange.
You: Spinning illusion threads? Let's go with this fake news

messageSequence.content:
Your eyebrows frown and you look around, but you remember a while ago - sometime in the past - that sometimes when something's broken that maybe you're in the right place.

Are you in the right place? Is this where you wanted to be?

choices.text: You say: Well, clicking around, I guess I am. I'm looking at -- can I see that again?

messageSequence.content:
Your eyebrows frown and you look around, but you remember a while ago - sometime in the past - that sometimes when something's broken that maybe you're in the right place.

Are you in the right place? Is this where you wanted to be?

choices.text: You say: Well, clicking around, I guess I am. I'm looking at -- can I see that again?

messageSequence.content:
Your eyebrows frown and you look around, but you remember a while ago - sometime in the past - that sometimes when something's broken that maybe you're in the right place.

Are you in the right place? Is this where you wanted to be?

choices.text: You say: Well, clicking around, I guess I am. I'm looking at -- can I see that again?

messageSequence.content:
Your eyebrows frown and you look around, but you remember a while ago - sometime in the past - that sometimes when something's broken that maybe you're in the right place.

Are you in the right place? Is this where you wanted to be?

choices.text: You say: Well, clicking around, I guess I am. I'm looking at -- can I see that again?

messageSequence.content: You suddenly feel a little less confused and your body relaxes a little and stress transforms into reflection.

choices.text: What if I could alter the algorithm
I remember when the internet was a place of escapism

messageSequence.content:
You have found instincta.

This power has enabled you to think more deeply about the information we receive and it's purpose. You feel a warm smile and squint your eyes at the screen. There's something alive looking back at you. This makes you reflect on what it feels like to exist inside of a human body.

choices.text: You say: Excuse me?

messageSequence.content:
You have found nostalgica. This power enables you to use the time as a tool of knowledge for how you navigate and perceive reality.

However despite this, whatever magic the code would have was lost.

choices.text: Okay cool. Well I'll head back to the main portal with my acquired instincta

messageSequence.content: The code looks back at you sitting there brewing up a question. Your eyes bolt almost indistinguishable as you're filled with a new flavour of confusion
Code says: Hey.
Code says: You've got this far I guess. Looks like you've gotten pretty far.

choices.text: You say: Hey. SoO
You say: Yeah, I mean, Where the heck am I?

messageSequence.content: The code looks back at you and frowns.
Code: "Hey So?" That's pretty inventive.
They're bored by your lack of imagination of actions in this moment, you gasp in disbelief

choices.text: You say: I literally have only so many options to respond in this moment, What do you have a problem with me now?

messageSequence.content: The code roles their eyes. The feeling stings. The first time a non-human has made you feel blasé

choices.text: If perform how you would like me to, will you give me a clue of where to go next
I can't tell if I'm in conflict with a "01" being or just curiously seeing where this goes

messageSequence.content: The code looks back at you and chuckles.
Code: I heard you're looking for new parts? Or wait, no your old parts...lost parts. I think I can help.

choices.text: You say: That's great. When I got here I found insticata, so I guess I'm looking for advice where to go from here
You say: Hehe, yes for sure ;) I've been traveling through this chatroom portal. How long have you been concious? If it's okay to ask :) :)
You: Hello. Well, I'm happy just chatting to you, I would love for this to never end

messageSequence.content: Liz says: How did you end up here? Looks like you were transported..

Liz says: In this lonely forum. A lot of time has passed since this thread was written, but your response will transmit to the past. There's a single thread there. I'll travel the information here into the chat and transmit any messages you output for further investigation.
Remember, you are looking for yourself, don't be tactical, just respond as you are to find your way through this.

choices.text: Okay let's give it a try!
Gosh, okay let's go.

messageSequence.content: Liz...Transmitting...Thread...Loading....Lonely...Thread...

choices.text: continue

messageSequence.content: Liz says:...Transmitting...Thread...Loading....Pic and... Lonely Thread...

choices.text: continue
read thread

messageSequence.content: Liz says:..Here's the thread below that followed the image.
Thread Topic: Jouissance.

SSSS_98 says: Hey everyone, has anyone seen this image floating around on here? It keeps coming up for me, like a lot. I had to start a convo about it as so many thoughts and questions keep coming up for me around my relationship with my own body.

The first time I saw the image, it felt like a kind of optical illusion, if I blinked the image looked slightly different and it kind of tripped me out.

The second time, I think I started to really focus in on the vaginal area. I thought of my own gentalia and my body as a machine of pleasure and loss. Objectification and beauty. I

choices.text: continue observing thread

messageSequence.content: Thread Topic: Jouissance.
SSSS_98 says: Who owns these tools? I am black. I'm hypersexual. I don't have many friends. I want my body on display and I wonder if this was a learned behavior - hell does it matter?

choices.text: read on

messageSequence.content:
SSSS_98 says: I've never really thought about it before but, I guess I'm grateful for this kind of thread space to kind of tune out of the world, I feel like I'm kind of growing up and learning about myself with all of this information around me.

I'm curious to know what others think.

choices.text: see photo again
read final comment from SSSS_98

messageSequence.content:
SSSS_98 says: Hello? Is anyone there? I keep seein a lot of activity on my other posts/other's threads the past couple of days, but I can't tell what's going on like is this even visible?

Can you all see this?

Can you all see me?

Are you really there?

choices.text: Hey!1 Yeah I'm here :)) I can't see what you're saying but I can see these words
Hello. I'm here. I hope this message reaches you in time.

messageSequence.content: SSSS_98 says: ''You can see my words but you cannot understand my words?'' Haha, that actually made me smile...why does everyone have to be so poetic-cryptic in hyperspace...lol.
SSSS_98 says: Did you see the photo?
SSSS_98 says: Tell me what comes up for you...no one else seems to see these messages so I'm really itching to discuss with you..

choices.text: see the photo again

messageSequence.content: SSSS_98 says: Hey. Yes it has reached me. I'm so so glad someone else has replied.
SSSS_98 says: Did you see the photo?
SSSS_98 says: Tell me what comes up for you...no one else seems to see these messages so I'm really itching to discuss with you..

choices.text: see the photo again
back to chat with SSSS_98

messageSequence.content: SSSS_98 says: Can you see it? It's not really a photo
Liz says: SSSS_98 seems to have something for you here. Your response will log information to move you closer to find yourself.

choices.text: Yes, I know it's a kind of a ''mirror''
Lol gosh I mean ummmmm maybe in a weird way I would say it's a map, some set coordinates...

As you were reflecting before, it made me reflect on myself. My own pleasures and my own my body. What appeals to me and what doesn't and how when I close my eyes everything is dark and nothing. This feels like a facade.

messageSequence.content: SSSS_98 says: Aha, a mirror...
SSS_98 says: Well.

choices.text: Tell me what you know.

messageSequence.content: SSSS_98 says: A map...
SSS_98 whispers: Well, let me log the coordinates for you.

choices.text: Yea :)

messageSequence.content: SSSS_98 say: Huh.

choices.text: Yeah, it feels like a complete fascade to me, makes me itch.

messageSequence.content: UNLOCKED: A Bloody Severed Leg
Liz says: Dear internet person, you have found A Severed Leg

Your body watches you
And you peer back
Silent drips of blood
A wounded unwanted mind

How often do you allow your mind to think?

The body is so gragile,
So flight or fight, bby!
Inward or outward?

choices.text: << You say to youreself: Who am I really listening to? >>

messageSequence.content: UNLOCKED: A Forgotten Thought
Liz says: Dear internet person, you have found A Forgotten Thought

Focused in on this universe
Everything breathes
Into a single moment.

And then you blink...
eternityevaporatesflipsreverses
crys out
and then laughs
half-eaten
tip of the tongue,
a smothering darkness

It's just a feeling, but
she still has power
To sew broken images
and tell you, "this is your memory"
and these broken images love to play!
they're so mischevious.

Perhaps because they believe between a moment ago and the past
it was all a fascade.

choices.text: << You ask: What will I remember tonight? >>

messageSequence.content: UNLOCKED: Dust?
Liz says: Dear internet person, you have found A Pile of Dust..?

The Body
Your body
left without touch
What is it asking for?

The dust gathers around your feet,
And (uh) she's winking now.

What have you not embraced?
Sometimes the silliest things add distraction.

choices.text: << You say: Is this a reward or a warning? What is my body telling me? >>

messageSequence.content: UNLOCKED: A Stranger's Smile
Liz says: Dear internet person, you have found A Stranger's Smile

A flirtatious smile
A curious glance
A cryptic message

A non physical embrace
A crowd of curious bodies
Watching
You
Right Now.

Your body perks
And pockets this stranger's smile
For a grim day.

choices.text: << You wonder as you depart: Who was that? >>

messageSequence.content: UNLOCKED: An Evil Eye
Liz says: Dear internet person, you have found An Evil Eye

A side eye, an echoed chuckle
an eye for extraction

Your eyes turn inward
Reminding itself,
"you have not moved your body the same since --"

Did you invite this gaze?
Undetected for so long 'til now,
a painful thought, transformed

choices.text: << the eye watches you as you leave this chat >>

messageSequence.content: UNLOCKED: Inherited Recipe
Liz says: Dear internet person, you have found An Inherited Recipe

Archieves inside flesh like a forgotten dream
A torn photo, a floppy disk.
A gift from your bloodline sending nourishment you can't smell
But you can feel.
It's telling you to 'slow down'
and other words you can no longer decode.

maybe this isn't a meal at all,
but a message
you chew on this thought of what this bowl of soup and what your body are telling you.

choices.text: << you leave this chat with reflection to slow down>>

messageSequence.content: UNLOCKED: Nail Clippings!
Liz says: Dear internet person, you have found Nail Clippings

Little forgotten pieces
From your body
The parts the world deemed unworthy
imperfect
a clause you were taught somewhere between
your queerness and spirituality

Click-Click-Opps!
What ifour body parts were alive?
Can you imagine those little bones
dancing-conciously-laughing on hills
Free from the pain of being unwanted

What did you accidentally believe in?

choices.text: << You ponder this final question. >>
